1: <pb/>Re' taqe i riih rumaam i Efraín xkimol kiib' xkiq'at reje wach i nim ha' Jordán xiooj chupaam i tinamit Zafá, xiooj k'oloq ruuk' i Jefté je' wili xkiq'or reh: <pb/>¿Chib'ih reet noq xat'ooj chi q'aq'inik cha wutkeel kuuk' i aj Amón? eh ma' xaq'or ta qeh, ruum i re' yu'naak naa qak'atam aapaat, hat junk'ahtiik ruuk' naaqanam, inki taqe.
2: <pb/>Eh re' Jefté je' wili kichaq'weesjiik xb'aan: <pb/>Re' noq xnub'an i kowlaj q'aq'inik wuch'ihil taqe i nutinamiit kuuk' i aj Amón re' hin xnutaq'aaj taq ak'amariik, eh re' taq i hat xama' xat chalik ta wo' taq chi qako'ljiik.
3: Eh xwilow i hin chi ma' xat chalik ta taq chi qako'ljiik re' hin xnuyeew wiib' pankimik wuch'ihil taqe i nutinamiit xinooj chi q'aq'inik kuuk' taqe i aj Amón. Eh re' i QaJaaw Dios xtoob'inik qeh chi xqa'an cho keh. ¿Chib'ih chik reet noq ti chalik taq chi q'aq'inik wuuk' i hin yu'naak?
4: <pb/>Eh re' Jefté xumol kiwach chu'nchel i winaq wilkeeb' Galaad, xi okik chi q'aq'inik kuuk' i riih rumaam i Efraín, eh xkian reh. Je' re' i xb'aan keh ruum re' taqe i riih rumaam i Efraín inkiq'or chi re' taqe i aj Galaad wilkeeb' chi kixilak i riih rumaam i Efraín, chi kixilak taqe i riih rumaam i Manasés, chi kixilak i riih rumaam i Efraín elenaq taqe chaloq.
5: <pb/>Re' taqe i aj Galaad inkiq'at i ye'aab' aha' ma' chaam ta wii' i ha' re' imb'aan wii' ik'ik chupaam i nim ha' Jordán. <pb/>Eh noq imponik ar jino'q i riih rumaam i Efraín elik i rub'an ma' nik' teesjiik ta kuum i aj Galaad, eh inkipahqaaj reh mi re' ruuk' taqe i riih rumaam Efraín. <pb/>Eh wila' xuq'or chi ma' re' ta ruuk',
6: inkipahqaaj reh chi chuq'or i q'orik Shibolet, eh wila' Sibolet i xkiq'or, ar inkireq chi riij i aj Galaad chi re' ruuk' i riih rumaam Efraín ruum re' keh ma' kichol taj i q'orik re' re'. <pb/>Eh inki chop ar inkikansaj chupaam i ye'aab' imb'aanwii' ik'ik chupaam nim ha' Jordán. Je' re' noq xkikansaj i kiib' roxk'ahl miil chi re' ruuk' i riih rumaam i Efraín.
7: <pb/>Eh re' Jefté waqiib' haab' xwihik chi taaq'anik chikinaah i aj Israel. Chi riij i re' xkimik reje ar xkiwuq'aa' Galaad, re' wo' x-aasjik wii'.
8: <pb/>Chi riij i Jefté re' chik i Ibzán aj Belén xokik chi taaq'anik chikinaah i aj Israel.
9: Re' winaq re' re' lajeeb' ru ka'winaq i rak'uun xwihik, eh lajeeb' ru ka'winaq wo' hoq i rixq'uun xwihik. Eh chu'nchel xuyeew taqe pan kaxáro kuuk' i tokoom kitinamitaal. Re' i Ibzán re' re' wuquub' haab' xwihik chi taaq'anik chikinaah i aj Israel,
10: eh noq xkimik ar xkimuq'aa' Belén.
11: <pb/>Chi riij i re', re' chik i Elón re' ruuk' taqe i riih rumaam Zabulón, lajeeb' haab' xwihik chi taaq'anik chikinaah.
12: Eh noq xkimik reje ar xkimuq'aa' chupaam i tinamit Ajalón wilik chupaam i ruyuq'ul i Zabulón.
13: <pb/>Chi riij i reh re' chik i Abdón rak'uun i Hilel Piratón i b'ih rutinamiit xokik chi taaq'anik chikinaah i aj Israel chuwach i waxiqiib' haab'.
14: Eh re' Abdón ka'winaq i rak'uun, lajeeb' ru ka'winaq i riih xwihik. Re' taqe re' chi riij i b'uurux kib'ehik. Eh waxiqiib' haab' xi wihik chi taaq'anik chikinaah i aj Israel.
15: Eh noq xkimik reje i Abdón rak'uun i Hilel ar xkimuq'aa' chupaam i tinamit Piratón wilik paruyuq'ul kiye'aab' i riih rumaam i Efraín, chinaah i ruyuq'ul i Amalec.
